featured.text: Then they would be so crisp that the diner wouldn’t be able to use his fork to eat them.
When the paper-thin browned potatoes arrived, the diner was pleased.
The additional tines made diners less likely to drop food, and the curved tines served as a scoop so people did not have to constantly switch to a spoon while eating.

definition.zh_def: 小餐館，通常提供簡單的餐點和快速的服務。
definition.en_def: A small, informal restaurant that serves simple meals, often open late.
definition.example: We decided to grab breakfast at the local diner before heading to the beach.
